Title: How It's Gotta Be
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (based on the series of graphic novels by), Tony Moore (based on the series of graphic novels by), Charlie Adlard (based on the series of graphic novels by), David Leslie Johnson, Angela Kang
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Lauren Cohan, Chandler Riggs
Plot: Every story and battle comes crashing together as everything Rick and his group have done will be put to the test.
